Title: Inception
Main Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
Description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a task to plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

Title: The Matrix
Main Cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Description: A hacker discovers the truth about reality and joins a rebellion against the machines controlling humanity.

Title: The Dark Knight
Main Cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
Description: Batman faces his greatest threat yet in the form of the Joker, a criminal mastermind wreaking havoc on Gotham City.

Title: Interstellar
Main Cast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Main Cast: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
Description: Interwoven stories of crime and redemption unfold in Quentin Tarantino's classic.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Main Cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
Description: A man wrongly imprisoned for murder forms a deep friendship with a fellow inmate while secretly plotting his escape.

Title: Titanic
Main Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane
Description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

Title: Forrest Gump
Main Cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
Description: The story of a simple man with a kind heart who influences major historical events.

Title: Gladiator
Main Cast: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
Description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

Title: The Godfather
Main Cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
Description: A powerful New York mafia family navigates crime, loyalty, and power struggles.
